name: Esports
description: Some say holding up the Summoner's Cup before a stadium of cheering fans is the greatest prize... others say it's the cash. The folks who make Skins on the League of Legends team? We think that the best part of winning Worlds is being immortalized in your favorite game. And we aren't biased!

skinlines.name: Challenger
skinlines.description: Commemorating the annual League of Legends season start.

skinlines.name: Conqueror
skinlines.description: Commemorating the League of Legends Mid-Season Invitational and Spring Split tournaments.

skinlines.name: World Championship
skinlines.description: The greatest stage in all of gaming. Two teams face off before millions of fans. Only one will be crowned the champion.
